dmca.title: KaZaA Owner Threatens Reverse Engineer
dmca.body:
Dear [private]:
 
The attached is a Cease and Desist Letter and Declaration of Compliance
sent on behalf of Sharman Networks, Ltd. ("Sharman") regarding your
infringement of Sharman's intellectual property rights.  Please comply
with all of the demands in the Cease and Desist Letter within the time
designated therein and send a signed copy of the Declaration of
Compliance to the address provided below.
 
Should you have any questions, you may contact me at the email address
or telephone number below.
 
Sincerely,
 
[private]
 
 
 
[private]

Stubbs Alderton & Markiles, LLP

BUSINESS & TECHNOLOGY LAW

 

[private]

Encino, California 91436

xxx-xxx-xxxx (Direct)

xxx-xxx-xxxx (Direct Facsimile)

[private]@[private].com

 

 

The information contained in this e-mail message is intended only for
the personal and confidential use of the recipient(s) named above. This
message may be an attorney-client communication and/or work product and
as such is privileged and confidential. If the reader of this message is
not the intended recipient or an agent responsible for delivering it to
the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that you have received
this document in error and that any review, dissemination, distribution,
or copying of this message is strictly prohibited. If you have received
this communication in error, please notify us immediately by e-mail, and
delete the original message.
